Sentencas: The third-order Ruddlesden-Popper phase Pr4Ni2.7Co0.3O10-delta (PNCO43) was synthesized by a freeze drying process.
Titulo: Oxygen surface exchange kinetics and electronic conductivity of the third-order Ruddlesden-Popper phase Pr4Ni2.7Co0.3O10-δ

Sentencas: Phase purity and crystal structure were determined by X-ray diffraction and Rietveld analysis.

Sentencas: Oxygen surface exchange coefficients k(q), calculated from the resistance of the electrode, show relatively high values (e.g. k(q) = 1.5 x 10(-6) cm s(-1) at 800 degrees C and 2 x 10(-1) bar pO(2)).
